text: José Luis Martínez-Almeida Navasqüés (born 17 April 1975) is a Spanish state lawyer and politician. He is a member of the People's Party (PP). He has been the Mayor of Madrid since 2019. He has been a member of the Madrid City Council since 2015. ==References== Category:Mayors of Madrid Category:Spanish lawyers Category:Living people Category:1975 births
title: José Luis Martínez-Almeida
